name: ui-options-chrome
description: User Interface Options Plus (UIO+) allows you to customize websites to match your own personal needs and preferences.
author: Fluid Project

scripts.pretest: node node_modules/.bin/rimraf reports/* coverage/* && grunt build
scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.test:node: node node_modules/.bin/nyc --temp-directory coverage --reporter none node tests/node/all-tests.js
scripts.test:browser: node node_modules/.bin/nyc --temp-directory coverage node_modules/testem/testem.js ci --file tests/browser/testem.js
scripts.test:vagrant: vagrant up && vagrant ssh -c 'cd /home/vagrant/sync/; DISPLAY=:0 npm test'
scripts.test:vagrantBrowser: vagrant up && vagrant ssh -c 'cd /home/vagrant/sync/; DISPLAY=:0 npm run test:browser'
scripts.test:vagrantNode: vagrant up && vagrant ssh -c 'cd /home/vagrant/sync/; DISPLAY=:0 npm run test:node'
scripts.posttest: node node_modules/.bin/nyc report --temp-directory coverage --reporter text-summary --reporter html
